column1: Where am I? Who are you?
column2: You died in a car crash and now you're here with a goddess such as myself. Although in a few minutes I'll be sending you to a new world.
column4: Basically. You'll be reincarnated into a world you'd typically find in a roguelike.
column5: So if I die that will be it?
column7: Do I get special abilities since I'm being reincarnated? I'd like to be a skilled archer in this new world because I did archery in my past life.
